PHRASE.LANG: Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this sweater will fill (or cover) you with the warm glow of Hanukkah all year ‘round. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]

Disponible UNIQUEMENT durant la période des fêtes 2010, ce sweatshirt vous remplira (ou vous entourera) de la chaude lueur de Hanoukka toute l’année. Joyeuses Fêtes de la part de Codename Games ! [#Legal]
Available ONLY for the 2010 holiday season, this sweater will fill (or cover) you with the warm glow of Hanukkah all year ‘round. Happy Holidays from Codename Games! [#Legal]
